title: I need to know what type is this font from a logo, please.
author: psyko1981

comments.content: It must be **[FF Dax (Medium)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317174529/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=FontShop&ffam=Dax%20-%20Medium&fid=e997390223abb3ccf601ae7718c6cddd&fsize=60&text=mira%20Cosmetica&fit=1)** by Hans Reichel [FontFont, 1995]
fvilanakis, it's Dax Bold :) Thanks for the help.
